column1: Smoque BBQ////My dad really enjoys barbecue. He had AA gift card to this place and it is on my way home from work so I ran by to pick up food. My daughter fell asleep in the car on the way
column2: I called them to see if they would run the food out as my daughter needed to sleep. Not only did they run the food out they made it so that they didn't have to go back inside by using the iPad so that I could just swipe my card there. What great customer service! I haven't even gotten home to eat the food
column3: but it's nails amazing. I have had their mac and cheese before and it was delicious!
